entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
